languages.text: {n}Духи машин бывают своенравны и недисциплинированы. Годы, проведенные без священного обслуживания, могли заставить его забыть о покорности. Обычно в таких случаях техножрецы приводят ретивых слуг Омниссии в ум ударом электрического стрекала или разводного ключа, сопровождаемым литанией бесперебойного послушания.{/n}

{n}Machine spirits can be capricious and undisciplined. After years without sanctified maintenance, this one may have forgotten all about obedience. Normally, in cases like these, a Tech-Priest would bring the wayward spirit to its senses with a shock from an electric prod or a blow from a wrench, accompanied by the litany of uninterruptible obedience.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Духи машин бывают своенравны и недисциплинированы. Годы, проведенные без священного обслуживания, могли заставить его забыть о покорности. Обычно в таких случаях техножрецы приводят ретивых слуг Омниссии в ум ударом электрического стрекала или разводного ключа, сопровождаемым литанией бесперебойного послушания.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Machine spirits can be capricious and undisciplined. After years without holy maintenance, this one may have forgotten all about obedience. Normally, in cases like these, a Tech-Priest will make the wayward spirit see sense with a shock from an electric prod or a blow from a wrench, accompanied by the litany of uninterruptible obedience.{/n}

{n}Machine spirits can be capricious and undisciplined. After years without holy maintenance, this one may have forgotten all about obedience. Normally, in cases like these, a Tech-Priest will make the wayward spirit see sense with a shock from an electric prod or a blow from a wrench, accompanied by the litany of uninterruptible obedience.{/n}

{n}Machine spirits can be capricious and undisciplined. After years without sanctified maintenance, this one may have forgotten all about obedience. Normally, in cases like these, a Tech-Priest will bring the wayward spirit to its senses with a shock from an electric prod or a blow from a wrench, accompanied by the litany of uninterruptible obedience.{/n}

Normally, in cases like these, a Tech-Priest would bring the wayward spirit to its senses with a shock from an electric prod or a blow from a wrench, accompanied by the litany of uninterruptible obedience.{/n}

Normally, in cases like these, a Tech-Priest would bring the wayward spirit to its senses with a shock from an electric prod or a blow from a wrench, accompanied by the litany of uninterruptible obedience.{/n}

languages.text: {n}機械精霊は気まぐれかつ奔放にもなり得る。神聖なメンテナンスが長年行われず、この精霊は従順さを完全に忘れてしまったのかもしれない。通常こうした場合、技術司祭が手に負えない精霊には絶え間ない服従の連祷を行いながら、電極でショックを与えるかレンチで殴るかして従順さを呼び起こす。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Machine spirits can be capricious and undisciplined. After years without sanctified maintenance, this one may have forgotten all about obedience. Normally, in cases like these, a Tech-Priest would bring the wayward spirit to its senses with a shock from an electric prod or a blow from a wrench, accompanied by the litany of uninterruptible obedience.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}機械精霊は気まぐれかつ奔放にもなり得る。神聖なメンテナンスが長年行われず、この精霊は従順さを完全に忘れてしまったのかもしれない。通常こうした場合、技術司祭が手に負えない精霊には絶え間ない服従の連祷を行いながら、電極でショックを与えるかレンチで殴るかして従順さを呼び起こす。{/n}

languages.text: {n}部分机魂会变得反复无常和毫无纪律。由于多年没受过神圣维护，这个机魂可能已经忘记了服从为何物。通常来说，在这种情况下，技术神甫会用电棍或扳手进行击打，来唤醒这个机魂。在这个过程中，机魂会表现出不间断的服从。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Machine spirits can be capricious and undisciplined. After years without sanctified maintenance, this one may have forgotten all about obedience. Normally, in cases like these, a Tech-Priest would bring the wayward spirit to its senses with a shock from an electric prod or a blow from a wrench, accompanied by the litany of uninterruptible obedience.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}部分机魂会变得反复无常和毫无纪律。由于多年没受过神圣维护，这个机魂可能已经忘记了服从为何物。通常来说，在这种情况下，技术祭司会用电棍或扳手进行击打，来唤醒这个机魂。在这个过程中，机魂会会表现出不间断的服从。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les esprits de la machine peuvent se montrer capricieux et indisciplinés. Après des années sans maintenance sanctifiée, celui-là semble avoir tout oublié de l'obéissance. En temps normal, pour ramener un esprit rebelle à la raison, les technoprêtres ont recours à un choc électrique ou à un coup de clé à molette accompagné d'une litanie d'obéissance ininterrompue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Machine spirits can be capricious and undisciplined. After years without sanctified maintenance, this one may have forgotten all about obedience. Normally, in cases like these, a Tech-Priest would bring the wayward spirit to its senses with a shock from an electric prod or a blow from a wrench, accompanied by the litany of uninterruptible obedience.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les esprits de la machine peuvent se montrer capricieux et indisciplinés. Après des années sans maintenance sanctifiée, celui-là semble avoir tout oublié de l'obéissance. En temps normal, pour ramener un esprit rebelle à la raison, les technoprêtres ont recours à un choc électrique ou à un coup de clé à molette accompagné d'une litanie d'obéissance ininterrompue.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A veces los espíritus máquina se muestran caprichosos e indisciplinados. Tras años de mantenimiento santificado, es posible que este haya olvidado ser obediente. En estos casos, es común que un tecnosacerdote haga entrar en razón al obstinado espíritu con una descarga de un bastón eléctrico o un golpe de una llave inglesa, acompañados de una letanía de obediencia imposible de interrumpir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Machine spirits can be capricious and undisciplined. After years without sanctified maintenance, this one may have forgotten all about obedience. Normally, in cases like these, a Tech-Priest would bring the wayward spirit to its senses with a shock from an electric prod or a blow from a wrench, accompanied by the litany of uninterruptible obedience.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A veces los espíritus máquina se muestran caprichosos e indisciplinados. Tras años de mantenimiento santificado, es posible que este haya olvidado ser obediente. En estos casos, es común que un tecnosacerdote haga entrar en razón al obstinado espíritu con una descarga de un bastón eléctrico o un golpe de una llave inglesa, acompañados de una letanía de obediencia imposible de interrumpir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maschinengeister können launisch und undiszipliniert sein. Dieser hier wurde viele Jahre lang keiner geheiligten Wartung unterzogen und hat daher vielleicht völlig vergessen, was Gehorsam überhaupt ist. Für gewöhnlich würde in einem solchen Fall ein Techpriester den abtrünnigen Geist mit einer Ladung aus einem Elektroschocker oder einem Hieb mit einem Schraubschlüssel zur Vernunft bringen, gefolgt von der Litanei des unterbrechungsfreien Gehorsams.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Machine spirits can be capricious and undisciplined. After years without sanctified maintenance, this one may have forgotten all about obedience. Normally, in cases like these, a Tech-Priest would bring the wayward spirit to its senses with a shock from an electric prod or a blow from a wrench, accompanied by the litany of uninterruptible obedience.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maschinengeister können launisch und undiszipliniert sein. Dieser hier wurde viele Jahre lang keiner geheiligten Wartung unterzogen und hat daher vielleicht völlig vergessen, was Gehorsam überhaupt ist. Für gewöhnlich würde in einem solchen Fall ein Techpriester den abtrünnigen Geist mit einer Ladung aus einem Elektroschocker oder einem Hieb mit einem Schraubschlüssel zur Vernunft bringen, gefolgt von der Litanei des unterbrechungsfreien Gehorsams.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Makine ruhlarının kaprisli ve disiplinsiz olması mümkündür. Kutsal bakımlar yapılmadan geçen onca yılda bu makine ruhu, itaati tamamen unutmuş olabilir. Normalde bu tip durumlarda bir Tekno Rahip; kesintiye uğramaması gereken itaat duaları eşliğinde, elektrikli bir sopanın şoku veya bir cıvata anahtarının darbesi vasıtasıyla asi ruhu kendine getirir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Machine spirits can be capricious and undisciplined. After years without sanctified maintenance, this one may have forgotten all about obedience. Normally, in cases like these, a Tech-Priest would bring the wayward spirit to its senses with a shock from an electric prod or a blow from a wrench, accompanied by the litany of uninterruptible obedience.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Makine ruhları kaprisli ve disiplinsiz olabilirler. Kutsal bakımlar yapılmadan geçen yıllar boyunca bu makine ruhu itaati tamamen unutmuş olabilir. Normalde bu tip durumlarda bir Tekno Rahip, asi ruhu, kesintiye uğratılmaması gereken itaat duaları eşliğinde, elektrikli bir sopanın şoku veya bir cıvata anahtarının darbesi vasıtasıyla kendine getirir.{/n}
